precisionPolicy.title: Precision Policy
precisionPolicy.description: Select the precision policy for loading and executing models. This affects memory usage and performance.
precisionPolicy.warning: Note: the precision parameter only affects non-quantized models (float32/float16). For quantized models (4-bit/8-bit), the weight precision is fixed, the setting only affects intermediate computations.

default.title: Standard
default.description: Optimal balance between performance and precision

memoryEfficient.title: Memory Efficient
memoryEfficient.description: Less memory usage, slightly lower precision

threadLimit.title: Manual CPU Thread Limit
threadLimit.description: If you need to limit the number of threads that candle can use through rayon, enable manual limit. The slider allows you to select the number of threads, after which the application will apply the RAYON_NUM_THREADS environment variable.

experimental.title: Experimental Features
experimental.description: Enable experimental features to test new capabilities. These features may be unstable and contain bugs.

modelSelector.title: Model Dropdown
modelSelector.description: Configure search within the main model dropdown. If you disable the option, the list will be displayed without a filter line.
modelSelector.enabledDescription: Search will help you quickly find the models you need.
modelSelector.disabledDescription: Search is hidden — the list shows all models as is.

performance.title: Performance Monitoring
performance.description: Tracking application performance, including startup time, memory usage, and model speed.

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the interface language. Changes will be applied immediately.
